translation.en: [little girl] No.
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: -[little girl babbling] -[man speaking German]
translation.zh: 都弄完了？

translation.en: I'm Lieutenant Dalton. I'm Lieutenant Dalton.
translation.zh: 我是达尔顿中尉 （奥地利 1954年）

translation.en: Lieutenant Dalton.
translation.zh: 达尔顿中尉

translation.en: -[man] Herr Werner? -Yes.
translation.zh: -维纳先生？ -是我

translation.en: I'm Lieutenant Dalton, up from Viden.
translation.zh: 我是达尔顿中尉 从维也纳来的

translation.en: We've found a few inconsistencies in our records from your time with us
translation.zh: 我们在你服役的记录中找到一些出入

translation.en: and we'd appreciate your help clarifying them.
translation.zh: 希望你能帮我们澄清一下

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -[Werner] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 求你了

translation.en: [woman] What do you want from us?
translation.zh: 你想要什么？

translation.en: -It's all right. -He didn't do anything to you.
translation.zh: -没事的 -他没有对你们做任何事

translation.en: He was a medic.
translation.zh: 他只是个医疗兵

translation.en: I don't know what stories he's been telling you,
translation.zh: 我不知道他和你编了什么故事

translation.en: but we know who he is, Vera.
translation.zh: 我不知道他和你编了什么故事 不过我们知道他是谁 薇拉

translation.en: My name is Annie.
translation.zh: 我的名字叫安妮

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不对

translation.en: No, your sons Klaus and the other boy, Dieter, they...
translation.zh: 不对 你的儿子叫克劳斯 另一个儿子叫迪特 他们…

translation.en: -[Annie screams] -Shit! Shit! Moshe!
translation.zh: 妈的！马瑟！

translation.en: [Dalton] It's the wrong guy. It's not even him!
translation.zh: 抓错人了 那不是他

translation.en: [Moshe] So, what?
translation.zh: 那又怎样？

translation.en: He was a Nazi.
translation.zh: 他曾经也是个纳粹

translation.en: I bet he was on someone's list.
translation.zh: 他肯定也在别人的追捕名单上

translation.en: [Moshe] You gonna give us a hand or what? Come on.
translation.zh: 你到底要不要帮忙？快点

translation.en: [man 2] I remember reading years ago
translation.zh: 我记得多年前读过一篇新闻

translation.en: some Austrian they mistook for me.
translation.zh: 他们错把一位奥地利人当作了我

translation.en: I have the article framed at home.
translation.zh: 我把这篇文章镶起来放在了家中

translation.en: I hope that future historians
translation.zh: 我希望未来的历史学家们

translation.en: will not be tempted to stray from the truth as we record it here today.
translation.zh: 不要偏离了今日记录在此的历史真相

translation.en: I could talk of what I saw
translation.zh: 我可以说说

translation.en: at the pits, in Minsk.
translation.zh: 我在明斯克战壕所看到的

translation.en: Or the vans at Chelmno,
translation.zh: 或者库尔姆集中营的毒气车上的事

translation.en: but these were the deeds and demands of others.
translation.zh: 但这些都是他人的行为及要求

translation.en: I issued no such orders.
translation.zh: 发出这些命令的不是我

translation.en: Our work was paperwork,
translation.zh: 我们的工作只是文书工作

translation.en: our war a numerical one.
translation.zh: 我们只与数字打交道

translation.en: And though I struggled against endless idiocy,
translation.zh: 虽然我一直在与无尽的愚蠢行为对抗

translation.en: I only did what little I could in Germany's fight against her enemies.
translation.zh: 在德国抗敌之时 我只做了仅能做的几件事而已

translation.en: [woman] You said you wanted to take a job in Jersey.
translation.zh: （布宜诺斯艾利斯 1960年） 你说过你想接受新泽西的工作

translation.en: Couldn't we run away? I'd do anything to be with you. Anything!
translation.zh: 我们不能逃走吗？ 我愿意和你做任何事！任何事！

translation.en: That's not a bad idea.
translation.zh: 这个主意不错

translation.en: That's not a bad idea at all.
translation.zh: 这个主意很不错

translation.en: -Just tell me one thing. -Yes.
translation.zh: -告诉我一件事 -好的

translation.en: Is it true?
translation.zh: 是真的吗？

translation.en: Is what true?
translation.zh: 什么是真的？

translation.en: Is your mother a nigger?
translation.zh: 你的母亲是个黑鬼？

translation.en: [man] Tell me.
translation.zh: 告诉我

translation.en: -[man shouting] Tell me! -[woman] What difference does it make?
translation.zh: -告诉我！ -那又有什么关系？

translation.en: -You love me. -All the kids talking behind my back.
translation.zh: -你爱我 -所有孩子都在背后议论我

translation.en: -[man] Is it true? Are you black? -[woman] No!
translation.zh: -是真的吗？你是黑人？ -不

translation.en: [woman] No, I'm as white as you.
translation.zh: 不 我和你一样是白人

translation.en: -[man] You're lying. -[woman] I'm not!
translation.zh: -你在说谎 -我没有！

translation.en: -[man] You're lying. You are! -[woman] I'm not! I'm not!
translation.zh: -你在说谎 -我没有！ -骗子！ -我不是！

translation.en: -[shushes] -[scoffs and chuckles]
translation.zh: -你就是！ -我不是！

translation.en: -[man] So, you're German too? -[woman] Well, my father is.
translation.zh: 所以你也是德国人？ 我的父亲是

translation.en: I'd love to meet him sometime. Can I see you again?
translation.zh: 有时间的话 我很想见见他 我能再见到你吗？

translation.en: Father made us learn 100 Spanish words a day.
translation.zh: 父亲逼着我们 每天学一百个西班牙语单词

translation.en: -One hundred. -No more, no less. I was...
translation.zh: -一百个 -不多不少 我…

translation.en: I was terrible.
translation.zh: 我学的很差劲

translation.en: I just wanted to ride horses and explore Tucumán.
translation.zh: 我只想骑马 探索图库曼

translation.en: What part of the Fatherland are you from?
translation.zh: 你是德国哪里人？

translation.en: [man] We moved all over during the war.
translation.zh: 战争期间我们到处搬家

translation.en: Oh, so your father, he was in the army?
translation.zh: 所以你的父亲是军人？

translation.en: SS, actually.
translation.zh: 其实是纳粹党卫军

translation.en: But he was killed in the East.
translation.zh: 不过他在东部被杀了

translation.en: Oh, I thought, I thought...
translation.zh: 我以为…

translation.en: [man] We live with my uncle now, Ricardo. He's, uh...
translation.zh: 我们现在和我叔叔里卡德一起住

translation.en: He's like a father to us.
translation.zh: 他就像我们的父亲一样

translation.en: [woman] I'm so sorry, Klaus.
translation.zh: 真遗憾 克劳斯

translation.en: That's awful.
translation.zh: 这太惨了

translation.en: Do you ever think about going back?
translation.zh: 你有没有想过回去？

translation.en: [Klaus] To Germany?
translation.zh: 回德国？

translation.en: Um, I don't know.
translation.zh: 我说不好

translation.en: I'm told things.
translation.zh: 我听过一些事情

translation.en: What things?
translation.zh: 什么事？

translation.en: Oh, the Jews, clawing power back,
translation.zh: 犹太人在重新掌握势力

translation.en: taking jobs, corrupting everything, like before.
translation.zh: 夺取工作 腐蚀一切 就像以前一样

translation.en: But, of course, there are plenty of them here too so...
translation.zh: 不过这里其实也有不少

translation.en: My uncle says they pop up everywhere, like mushrooms after rain.
translation.zh: 我叔叔说他们遍地都是 就像雨后的蘑菇一样

translation.en: -Mushrooms. -[Klaus chuckles]
translation.zh: 蘑菇

translation.en: -[laughing] Mushrooms. -[woman laughs out loud]
translation.zh: 蘑菇

translation.en: A toast.
translation.zh: 我敬一杯酒

translation.en: To your father.
translation.zh: 敬给你父亲

translation.en: A hero, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 他肯定是个英雄

translation.en: Tell me, would I recognize his name?
translation.zh: 告诉我 我是否听说过他的大名？

translation.en: [man 1] Mr. Harel.
translation.zh: 哈偌先生

translation.en: Mr. Harel. Just five minutes.
translation.zh: 哈偌先生 就占用五分钟

translation.en: [man 2] Herr Harel, please. Sir, this is Herr Fritz Bauer,
translation.zh: 哈偌先生 长官 这位是菲兹鲍尔

translation.en: he's the District Attorney of Hessen in West Germany.
translation.zh: 西德黑森州的地区检察官

translation.en: He says he's found someone.
translation.zh: 他说他找到了某个人

translation.en: [Herr Fritz Bauer] I have a lead on a great enemy of our people.
translation.zh: 我有关于一位人民公敌的线索

translation.en: I don't have time for this. Rafi, take care of it, okay?
translation.zh: 我没时间 拉斐 交给你吧

translation.en: [Herr Fritz Bauer] Adolf Eichmann is not just some pencil pusher.
translation.zh: 阿道夫艾希曼可不是什么小人物

translation.en: This man deserves to be punished.
translation.zh: 这个人应受到惩罚

translation.en: [Harel] You have the word of a blind man.
translation.zh: 是一个盲人告诉你这个消息的

translation.en: [Bauer] He doesn't need his eyes to hear the boy's name. Klaus Eichmann.
translation.zh: 他不需要双眼就能听见 那个男孩的名字 克劳斯艾希曼

translation.en: [Harel] Why would this girl, Sylvia, date a Nazi's son?
translation.zh: 这个叫希尔维娅的女孩 为什么要和纳粹的儿子约会？

translation.en: Hermann spent time in Dachau;
translation.zh: 赫曼在达豪集中营待过

translation.en: he decided to raise Sylvia Catholic.
translation.zh: 他决定将希尔维娅抚养成天主教徒

translation.en: [Rafi] She didn't know she was Jewish?
translation.zh: 她不知道自己是犹太人？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Has he broken the bad news to her yet?
translation.zh: 他有没有把这个坏消息告诉她？

translation.en: [Bauer chuckles] Yeah. She insists on seeing him still.
translation.zh: 告诉了 但她还在继续和他约会

translation.en: Says she's a good Catholic and the boy is, too.
translation.zh: 她说自己是虔诚的天主教徒 那个男孩也是

translation.en: [Harel] Okay. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你

translation.en: Listen, I really appreciate your coming,
translation.zh: 听着 我很感谢你来这里

translation.en: but you have to understand. I got Egypt wreaking havoc,
translation.zh: 但你得明白 埃及现在一片混乱

translation.en: the Fedayeen. Hikers getting killed at Masada.
translation.zh: 我要处理阿拉伯突击敢死队 徒步者在马察达被杀

translation.en: Our resources are limited.
translation.zh: 我们的人手有限

translation.en: I can't waste them chasing rumors. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我没办法把资源浪费在谣言上 抱歉

translation.en: Think what it means.
translation.zh: 想想这意味着什么

translation.en: Jews finally, publicly, holding to account the man who organized our slaughter.
translation.zh: 犹太人终于能公开抓住 那个组织过我们大屠杀的人

translation.en: Organized. Past tense.
translation.zh: 组织过 这是过去时了

translation.en: It is my job, Herr Bauer,
translation.zh: 鲍尔先生 我的职责

translation.en: to focus on those who are planning it today.
translation.zh: 是抓捕那些现如今计划屠杀的人

translation.en: Thank you very much for coming.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你来这里

translation.en: -Please-- -[Harel] Thank you very much.
translation.zh: -拜托… -非常感谢

translation.en: Just give me one second.
translation.zh: 等我一下

translation.en: Sir?
translation.zh: 长官？

translation.en: Let's say he's right.
translation.zh: 如果他说的是真的

translation.en: Can you imagine the headache when he tells the world
translation.zh: 你能想象当他告诉全世界

translation.en: that we wouldn't waste our resources on the architect of the Final Solution?
translation.zh: 我们不愿浪费资源去抓捕 “最终方案”始作俑者时的困境吗？

translation.en: Slowly.
translation.zh: 慢一点

translation.en: What are you...?
translation.zh: 你在…

translation.en: Shall we just stand here?
translation.zh: 我们就这样站着吗？

translation.en: You're waving at my crotch in a weird way.
translation.zh: 你在用奇怪的方式向我的胯部挥舞

translation.en: Just get in there. Don't be afraid.
translation.zh: 你就打吧 不用害怕

translation.en: I'm not afraid, we're focusing on technique.
translation.zh: 我没害怕 我们在练习技巧

translation.en: Okay, well technically, do it better.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就把技巧做得更好些

translation.en: You know why they throw all the shittiest jobs at you, right?
translation.zh: 你知道他们为何 把最烂的工作都丢给你吧？

translation.en: I don't know, antisemitism?
translation.zh: 不知道 反犹太主义？

translation.en: Shall we?
translation.zh: 开始吧？

translation.en: Don't be scared.
translation.zh: 别害怕

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey, Rafi.
translation.zh: -嗨 -嗨 拉斐

translation.en: -[Rafi] Aharoni, come with me. -[Aharoni] You got it.
translation.zh: 阿哈罗尼 跟我来 好的

translation.en: -Where you going? -[Rafi] Aharoni's got a flight to catch.
translation.zh: 你们去哪儿？ 阿哈罗尼要赶航班

translation.en: I'll call if I need you.
translation.zh: 如果需要你 我会打给你

translation.en: -[Klaus] Sylvia. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -希尔维娅 -谢谢

translation.en: -[Sylvia] Klaus, hi. -Hey.
translation.zh: 克劳斯 你好

translation.en: You made it.
translation.zh: 你来了

translation.en: -Let me show you through. -Could we go somewhere first?
translation.zh: -我带你参观下 -我们能不能先去别的地方？

translation.en: -I need to tell you something. Okay. -Can we wait? He's about to speak.
translation.zh: -我有事要告诉你 -就两分钟 他马上就讲话了

translation.en: Carlos.
translation.zh: 卡洛斯

translation.en: -[Klaus] This is Sylvia. -[Sylvia] Hello.
translation.zh: 这位是希尔维娅 你好

translation.en: My word.
translation.zh: 我的天

translation.en: Look at those eyes. Your hair.
translation.zh: 看看这双眼睛 你的头发

translation.en: Where's your family from?
translation.zh: 你家是哪儿的？

translation.en: -[Sylvia] Um, I'm... -[man] We're ready for you.
translation.zh: -我… -我们为您准备好了

translation.en: Come.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: [Klaus] You see those two?
translation.zh: 看见那两个人了吗？

translation.en: That's the Deputy Mayor and a member of Parliament.
translation.zh: 那是副市长和议员

translation.en: [Sylvia] Who is that man you introduced me to?
translation.zh: 你刚才给我介绍的那个人是谁？

translation.en: [Klaus] Carlos Fuldner. He helped my family settle in Argentina.
translation.zh: 卡洛斯弗德纳 他帮助我的家庭定居阿根廷

translation.en: Amigos...
translation.zh: 朋友们

translation.en: our hundred fiftieth Independence Day approaches.
translation.zh: 我们的一百五十周年独立日即将来临

translation.en: [Carlos] There will be a chance for us to dance,
translation.zh: 我们将有机会跳舞

translation.en: to drink, for freedom.
translation.zh: 畅饮以庆祝自由

translation.en: [Carlos] But have you noticed the road blocks...
translation.zh: 但你们是否注意到路障

translation.en: ...gunshots,
translation.zh: 枪声

translation.en: violence,
translation.zh: 暴力

translation.en: every day across Buenos Aires?
translation.zh: 每天都充斥着布宜诺斯艾利斯？

translation.en: Now should be the time to celebrate our national unity,
translation.zh: 这本应是庆祝我们国家团结

translation.en: the iron bond of church and state.
translation.zh: 庆祝教会与国家的紧密纽带之时

translation.en: It doesn't decay, amigos.
translation.zh: 腐朽已经出现 朋友们

translation.en: A rot within our society,
translation.zh: 我们的社会已经出现败类

translation.en: that is forcing us to fight for our beloved and holy patria.
translation.zh: 正逼迫我们为自己的爱人 和神圣的祖国战斗

translation.en: Who can tell me its name?
translation.zh: 谁知道他们叫什么？

translation.en: Jew!
translation.zh: 犹太人！

translation.en: [in Spanish] Thank you, Father.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 神父

translation.en: Loyal only to themselves.
translation.zh: 他们只忠于自己

translation.en: The Jew will betray our homeland
translation.zh: 犹太人将背叛我们的祖国

translation.en: and continue poisoning this great nation of Argentina.
translation.zh: 继续毒害阿根廷这个伟大的国家

translation.en: So, I ask you.
translation.zh: 所以我问你们

translation.en: What should we do with the Jew?
translation.zh: 我们应该对犹太人做什么？

translation.en: Soap.
translation.zh: 人油肥皂

translation.en: Again.
translation.zh: 再问一次

translation.en: What must we make of the Jew?
translation.zh: 我们必须要把犹太人做成什么？

translation.en: [crowd] Soap!
translation.zh: 人油肥皂！

translation.en: -Jew! Jew! Jew! -[crowd] Soap! Soap! Soap!
translation.zh: -犹太人！ -人油肥皂！ -犹太人！ -人油肥皂！ -犹太人！ -人油肥皂！

translation.en: [male player 1] Okay. Are you in, or are you out?
translation.zh: 好的 你到底要不要继续玩？

translation.en: -[male player 2] In. -[male player 1] Peter, your turn.
translation.zh: -继续 -韦德 到你了

translation.en: [male player 1] Peter, let's go. Play.
translation.zh: 皮特 快点 好吗？

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey!
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Come on, kids.
translation.zh: 来吧 孩子们

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Mama?
translation.zh: 妈妈？

translation.en: Mama, what's wrong? What happened?
translation.zh: 妈妈 怎么了？发生什么事？

translation.en: [mother] Your sister.
translation.zh: 你姐姐

translation.en: She was on top and I closed it.
translation.zh: 她在上面 然后我关门弄掉了

translation.en: It's all right. I'm sure she forgives you.
translation.zh: 没关系 她会原谅你的

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 你看

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.zh: 真美

translation.en: Go put them in some water. I'll clean up.
translation.zh: 把花放在水里 我来清理这些

translation.en: New refrigerator, huh?
translation.zh: 新冰箱？

translation.en: Who'd you kill to get that?
translation.zh: 你把谁杀了弄来的？

translation.en: Seriously, should I worry? Is there a dead body in there?
translation.zh: 说真的 我要担心吗？ 这里面有没有尸体？

translation.en: I haven't seen Hanna lately.
translation.zh: 我最近没怎么见到汉娜

translation.en: Mama, please.
translation.zh: 妈妈 拜托

translation.en: What? First you see her all the time.
translation.zh: -怎么？ -你一开始总和她一起

translation.en: -No relationship talk. -You were ready...
translation.zh: -不要谈论婚恋 -你们已经准备

translation.en: -We've been over this. Eat your soup. -...to start something. Poof. She's gone.
translation.zh: -我们说好不再谈这个 快喝汤 -开始一起生活 突然她就消失了

translation.en: Please.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Peter, don't you dare. It's Shabbat.
translation.zh: 皮特 不许接 今天可是安息日

translation.en: It could be an emergency.
translation.zh: 有可能是急事

translation.en: Don't come complaining to me if you get sick after eating cold soup.
translation.zh: 要是你因为喝凉汤生病了 可不要跟我抱怨

translation.en: Who gets sick from eating cold soup? Ma, please. Hello.
translation.zh: 谁会因为喝凉汤生病？拜托 你好

translation.en: Is this about the Astypalaia thing?
translation.zh: 是有关斯坦帕利亚岛的事吗？

translation.en: Because, to be honest, I've read maybe 70% of the briefing.
translation.zh: 说实话 我只读了简报的百分之七十

translation.en: -[Rafi] No, it is not. -Okay, good, 'cause it's more like 30%.
translation.zh: 不是 很好 因为我只读了三成

translation.en: Finale.
translation.zh: 最终

translation.en: [Rafi] Aharoni's out there now running reconnaissance in Buenos Aires
translation.zh: 阿哈罗尼现在 在布宜诺斯艾利斯做侦察

translation.en: with our guy at the Embassy.
translation.zh: 和我们驻大使馆的人一起

translation.en: Our contact's daughter, Sylvia Hermann,
translation.zh: 我们线人的女儿 希尔维娅赫曼

translation.en: has agreed to take us to Klaus Eichmann's family home.
translation.zh: 同意带我们去克劳斯艾希曼的家里

translation.en: If it is Eichmann, they will attempt to get a positive photo ID.
translation.zh: 如果真的是艾希曼 他们会想办法照张照片 以确定身份

translation.en: Why didn't you ask me? Aharoni's an interrogator.
translation.zh: 你为什么不让我去？ 阿哈罗尼是负责审问的

translation.en: [Rafi] Precisely.
translation.zh: 正因如此

translation.en: I wanted someone who would interrogate the evidence rather than just shoot at it.
translation.zh: 我想找一个能够审问证据 而不是直接击毙证据的人

translation.en: This is strictly catch and extract.
translation.zh: 这次行动只是捉捕

translation.en: Raf, if it is him, a bullet would be easier than dragging him here.
translation.zh: 拉斐 如果真是他 那么枪毙 要比把他带回这里简单得多

translation.en: Eichmann will stand trial here in Israel.
translation.zh: 艾希曼要在以色列接受审问

translation.en: Trial? Nobody needs to hear what he has to say.
translation.zh: 审问？没人想听他辩护

translation.en: [Rafi] The Prime Minister disagrees.
translation.zh: 总理并不这么认为

translation.en: A trial will help put all of this to bed.
translation.zh: 审讯能将这件事彻底了断

translation.en: After all, not everyone's as emotionally balanced as you are.
translation.zh: 毕竟不是每个人的心态都像你这么好

translation.en: Peter, it isn't about you, okay?
translation.zh: 皮特 这事不仅关系到你自己 好吗？

translation.en: Okay. I'm in.
translation.zh: 好吧 算我一个

translation.en: [Harel] You're not going.
translation.zh: 你不能去

translation.en: Every op leader describes you as manipulative, impulsive and self-absorbed.
translation.zh: 每个行动的负责人都说你 善于摆布他人、冲动、固执己见

translation.en: [Peter] No one mentioned my sense of humor?
translation.zh: 没有人提到我的幽默感

translation.en: [Harel] And the fiasco in Austria.
translation.zh: 还有奥地利的那次惨败

translation.en: The strings I had to pull. You killed the wrong damn Nazi!
translation.zh: 我帮你打通的关系 你杀错了该死的纳粹！

translation.en: I remember, sir. It wasn't even the right Nazi.
translation.zh: 我记得 长官 那人不是我要找的纳粹

translation.en: We are talking about violating Argentina's sovereignty
translation.zh: 我们要在阿根廷庆祝 一百五十周年独立日的时候

translation.en: while they are celebrating 150 years of independence.
translation.zh: 前去侵犯他们的主权

translation.en: If we fail, Israel will be humiliated,
translation.zh: 如果失败了 以色列会蒙羞

translation.en: the local Jews terrorized, and I've lost some of my best agents.
translation.zh: 当地的犹太人会被实施恐怖统治 我会失去一些最好的特工

translation.en: So, what makes him worth the risk?
translation.zh: 所以我凭什么要冒他这个风险？

translation.en: For starters, this current plan's a real piece of shit.
translation.zh: 首先 这个计划简直烂透了

translation.en: [Harel] Great start.
translation.zh: 真是会说话

translation.en: [Rafi] Peter.
translation.zh: 皮特

translation.en: If you wanna get him out alive, you need a basic crew.
translation.zh: 如果你想带他活着回来 你需要最基本的人员

translation.en: No soldiers, no guns. Period.
translation.zh: 绝不能涉及士兵或枪支

translation.en: If we get into a shoot-out, we've failed already
translation.zh: 如果我们引起枪战 那就失败了

translation.en: and it says here that you want to extract him
translation.zh: 这里还说你想通过船运集装箱

translation.en: via shipping container, but that would take weeks.
translation.zh: 把他运回来 但这需要几周的时间

translation.en: We do that, he won't make it past Rio. The only way is by plane.
translation.zh: 这样做的话 到达里约之前他就死了 唯一的方法只有飞机

translation.en: [Harel] Military planes can't reach Argentina.
translation.zh: 我们的军事飞机无法到达阿根廷

translation.en: You think I haven't thought about it?
translation.zh: 你以为我没想过这点吗？

translation.en: No, I'm sorry. Of course, sir. Of course.
translation.zh: 不 抱歉 长官 你当然想过

translation.en: I'm guessing El Al is not an option.
translation.zh: 我猜以色列航空也不行

translation.en: El Al doesn't fly commercially to Argentina.
translation.zh: 以色列航空没有去阿根廷的商业航班

translation.en: Perhaps if we had a good cover story, they could be convinced?
translation.zh: 也许如果我们编个好故事 他们会相信？

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.zh: 也许吧

translation.en: [Peter] You said it's Argentina's 150th anniversary, right?
translation.zh: 你说过这是阿根廷 一百五十周年独立日？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: So we get ambassadors, politicians, whatever,
translation.zh: 我们可以派大使、政府官员之类的

translation.en: send them over there to say, "Mazel tov. Hurrah for independence."
translation.zh: 送他们去那边说： “恭喜 祝贺你们的独立日”

translation.en: [Rafi] We'll invite Abba Eban, everybody loves him.
translation.zh: 我们可以邀请阿巴埃班 大家都热爱他

translation.en: Then we sneak Eichmann on board, airlift him here direct.
translation.zh: 然后偷偷把艾希曼带上飞机 直接飞回来

translation.en: [Harel] What about airport security?
translation.zh: 那机场安检呢？

translation.en: I'll disguise him to look like one of us.
translation.zh: 我可以把他装扮成我们中的一员

translation.en: -[Rafi] He'll struggle. -We'll sedate him.
translation.zh: -他会反抗 -我们会给他打镇静剂

translation.en: Make him seem hung over, drunk to shit.
translation.zh: 让他看起来像是喝醉酒一样

translation.en: [Harel] To keep him in that state for hours.
translation.zh: 让他处于这种状态几个小时

translation.en: -The only agent that we have-- -[Rafi] Had.
translation.zh: -我们唯一的一位特工… -曾经的

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: She's refused every job I've offered her after Bren.
translation.zh: 在布兰任务之后 她拒绝了我分配的所有工作

translation.en: That wasn't Hanna's fault though. The guy was allergic, right?
translation.zh: 不过那并不是汉娜的错 那家伙过敏 对吗？

translation.en: She's the only one with the right field experience for this.
translation.zh: 她是唯一一个有专业经验的人

translation.en: -I'll get her to do it. -I thought you two weren't...
translation.zh: -我会说服她的 -我以为你们两个不…

translation.en: -What, together? -Speaking.
translation.zh: -什么 不在一起？ -不来往了

translation.en: She'll do it, trust me. Sir...
translation.zh: 她会同意的 相信我 长官

translation.en: we'll get him back here alive.
translation.zh: 我们会把他活着带回来的

translation.en: Get Hanna on board, then we talk.
translation.zh: 先让汉娜同意 我们再商量

translation.en: -Five minutes. Hear me out. -I don't wanna hear.
translation.zh: -就五分钟 听我说 -我不想听

translation.en: Is Mrs. Levington in prep? ECG done?
translation.zh: 莱温顿女士准备好了吗？ 心电图做完了？

translation.en: -You know how important this is. -Hi, Michael. See you tonight.
translation.zh: -你知道这事有多重要 -嗨 迈克 今晚见

translation.en: Who's Michael?
translation.zh: 迈克是谁？

translation.en: What's tonight?
translation.zh: 今晚做什么？

translation.en: The trains that shipped the families to the camps, that was him.
translation.zh: 那些运送家人去集中营的火车 都是他指使的

translation.en: -I'm not joining your hit squad. -[Peter] No, that...
translation.zh: 我不会参加你的突击小队 不 那…

translation.en: Yes, I would happily put a bullet in-between his eyes,
translation.zh: 没错 我很愿意一枪击爆他的头

translation.en: but that's not what we're doing.
translation.zh: 但我们的任务不是这样

translation.en: Did you hear what happened last time?
translation.zh: 你听说上一次发生的事了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Rafi told me. The guy was allergic.
translation.zh: 是的 拉斐告诉我了 那个人过敏

translation.en: That's what he told you?

translation.en: [Hanna] No, we kept on landing and refueling.
translation.zh: 不 我们一直在降落、加油

translation.en: Rafi kept telling me to put him under again and again and again.
translation.zh: 拉斐让我一次又一次地给他打镇定剂

translation.en: So, I did.
translation.zh: 所以我照做了

translation.en: That was Rafi's fault, not yours.
translation.zh: 那是拉斐的错 和你无关

translation.en: My needle, my fault.
translation.zh: 我打的针 我的错

translation.en: First do no harm, that's what we swear, and I won't break it, not again!
translation.zh: 无损于病人为先 这是我们的誓言 我不会再次打破誓言！

translation.en: That's why we need you.
translation.zh: 所以我们才需要你

translation.en: In Buenos Aires.
translation.zh: 去布宜诺斯艾利斯

translation.en: Where we'll need you to eat steak.
translation.zh: 你在那里吃些牛排

translation.en: And drink red wine and definitely go tango dancing.
translation.zh: 喝些红酒 肯定还要跳跳探戈

translation.en: I need you.
translation.zh: 我需要你

translation.en: -[Aharoni] Another road block. -[man] For the 150th.
translation.zh: 又是路障 为了一百五十周年

translation.en: The government says they're protecting democracy.
translation.zh: 政府说他们在保护民主

translation.en: They're all over the city.
translation.zh: 全城到处都是他们的身影

translation.en: What are they so afraid of?

translation.en: [man] Commies.

translation.en: Jews.
translation.zh: 犹太人

translation.en: Nacionalistas, Peronistas.
translation.zh: 民粹、庇隆主义拥护者

translation.en: Depends who you ask.

translation.en: Knock on the door, deliver the gift,

translation.en: get his uncle outside, don't give them cause for suspicion.

translation.en: Enough of that to go around already.

translation.en: [Aharoni] Listen carefully, all right?

translation.en: If you're feeling any kind of danger whatsoever, you get out.

translation.en: It's going to be all right.

translation.en: You're the Sylvia.

translation.en: Well, come in.

translation.en: Oh, I'll just...

translation.en: Oh, aren't they?

translation.en: Is it a special occasion?
translation.zh: 是为了什么特殊场合吗？

translation.en: This year even more so.
translation.zh: 今年更是如此

translation.en: Smell them.
translation.zh: 来闻闻

translation.en: Smell them.
translation.zh: 来闻闻

translation.en: Oh, hello there.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: [woman] Oh, darling. This is Sylvia.

translation.en: The Sylvia.

translation.en: Such a pleasure.

translation.en: [Sylvia] Klaus and I had a bit of a disagreement, so I thought I would come over and...

translation.en: try to fix things.

translation.en: -[woman] Oh. -[baby coos]

translation.en: I'll make us come coffee.

translation.en: Oh, no thank you. I can't stay long.

translation.en: No, please. We're delighted to have you.

translation.en: So, what do you think?
translation.zh: 所以你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: I'm sorry?

translation.en: The house.
translation.zh: 这个房子

translation.en: I mean, there's still no electricity, but she's getting there.

translation.en: Yes, it's quite lovely, Herr...?

translation.en: Klement. Señor Klement.
translation.zh: 克莱门特 克莱门特先生

translation.zh: 克莱门特先生

translation.en: I'm sorry.

translation.en: I don't wish to pry, but would you describe to me its nature?

translation.en: [Klaus] Sylvia, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 希尔维娅 你来这里做什么？

translation.en: -[Eichmann] Hey, watch your tone, Klaus. -I just came to apologize.

translation.en: Klaus, you're just in time for coffee.

translation.en: No. Sylvia's leaving.
translation.zh: 不用了 希尔维娅要走了

translation.en: Now hold on just a minute.
translation.zh: 你给我等一下

translation.en: Klaus. I said wait a moment.
translation.zh: 克劳斯 我说等一下

translation.en: This is how I taught you to behave, is it?

translation.en: I'm sorry, Father.

translation.en: You've no need to call me that.

translation.en: [Klaus] Sylvia.
translation.zh: 希尔维娅

translation.en: [Klaus] Sylvia.
translation.zh: 希尔维娅

translation.zh: -你拍到了吗？ -我不知道

translation.en: She'll take the bus.
translation.zh: 她会坐公交车

translation.en: Get out of here.
translation.zh: 离开这里

translation.en: Sylvia.
translation.zh: 希尔维娅

translation.en: Listen.
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: You embarrassed me.

translation.en: -Leaving the meeting like that. -I know.
translation.zh: -就那样离开了集会 -我知道

translation.en: I had to leave, and I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我不得不离开 抱歉

translation.en: Carlos...
translation.zh: 卡洛斯…

translation.en: He said he thought you might be a...
translation.zh: 他说你可能是…

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 我是

translation.en: [Sylvia] Does that really matter to you?
translation.zh: 你真的很在意这一点吗？

translation.en: [Rafi] Isser is here.
translation.zh: 伊瑟来了

translation.en: [Rafi] This is Dani Shalom from documents, and you know Moshe, he'd handle the vehicles.
translation.zh: 这位是文件部的丹尼夏隆 你认识马瑟 他负责车辆

translation.en: [Harel] Where's Hanna?
translation.zh: 汉娜在哪里？

translation.en: Sorry I'm late, sir.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我来迟了 长官

translation.en: That steak better be good.
translation.zh: 牛排最好别让我失望

translation.en: [Harel] Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Harel] This is everything Sylvia Hermann could give us.
translation.zh: 这些是希尔维娅赫曼 能给我们的全部资料

translation.en: As for the pictures, our guy at Tel Hashomer Hospital is saying the ears match.
translation.zh: 至于那些照片 我们在特哈休莫医院 工作的人说耳朵是一致的

translation.en: Hardly compelling evidence.
translation.zh: 这个证据难以令人信服

translation.en: Sylvia heard Klaus call him father.
translation.zh: 希尔维娅听到克劳斯叫他父亲

translation.en: -"You don't need to call me that." -[Harel] Not enough.
translation.zh: -“你不必这样称呼我” -这些还不够

translation.en: You have to make sure it's him. Give me documentary proof. Come on.
translation.zh: 你们必须确定就是他 给我有记录的证明 快点

translation.en: Wait. Look.
translation.zh: 等一下 你们看

translation.en: The flowers.
translation.zh: 这些花

translation.en: -Here. -Vera implied it was a special occasion.
translation.zh: -这里 -薇拉暗示这花是为了特殊场合

translation.en: "This year even more so."
translation.zh: “今年更是如此”

translation.en: -What date was Sylvia there? -Uh...

translation.en: [Hanna] Here.
translation.zh: 这里

translation.zh: 结婚证

translation.en: -[Rafi] Hey, careful. -Like it makes a difference.
translation.zh: -嘿 小心点 -反正也没区别

translation.en: There's a system to this.
translation.zh: 这些文件是分门别类放的

translation.en: [Peter] Here.
translation.zh: 这里

translation.en: Why is 1960 a special year?
translation.zh: 为什么1960年这么特殊？

translation.en: Because 25 years ago Adolf Eichmann
translation.zh: 因为25年前 阿道夫艾希曼

translation.en: married his wife, Vera Liebl, on the 21st of March.
translation.zh: 和他的妻子薇拉丽波于3月21日结婚

translation.en: [Peter] We have our guy.
translation.zh: 我们找到他了

translation.en: Ricardo Klement is Adolf Eichmann.
translation.zh: 里卡德克莱门特就是阿道夫艾希曼

translation.en: [Peter] All right. Round two.
translation.zh: 好了 第二轮

translation.en: -[piano playing] -[Peter] Next week in Buenos Aires.
translation.zh: 下周就去布宜诺斯艾利斯了

translation.en: Yaakov, welcome. Our wonderful front man.
translation.zh: 雅科夫 欢迎 我们的头面人物

translation.en: He's a little ugly, but we'll make do, right?
translation.zh: 他有点丑 不过我们就凑合了 对吗？

translation.en: [Yaakov in Hebrew] Todah rabah.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Okay. For the ones who can't.
translation.zh: 好了 敬给那些无法在场的人

translation.en: May his name be obliterated, huh?
translation.zh: 让他的罪名流芳千古？

translation.en: So, why are we making him famous?
translation.zh: 我们为什么要让他成名？

translation.en: [Moshe] We should be putting him down like a mad dog.
translation.zh: 我们应该像对待疯狗一样打死他

translation.en: That's not what I'm here for, Moshe.

translation.en: [Moshe] Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: How many did you lose?
translation.zh: 你失去了多少？

translation.en: I'm not competing with you.
translation.zh: 我可不想和你比赛

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么？

translation.en: -We're really doing this? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你真想这样做？ -是的

translation.en: [Yaakov] All right, asshole.
translation.zh: 好吧 混蛋

translation.en: My parents, aunts, uncles, four cousins.
translation.zh: 我的父母、姨妈们 叔叔伯伯、四个表亲

translation.en: Dachau.
translation.zh: 达豪集中营

translation.en: [Dani Shalom] I'm the only one left.
translation.zh: 我是唯一一个还活着的

translation.en: [Peter] Hey, Moshe, enough.
translation.zh: 嘿 马瑟 够了

translation.en: All right? Raf, you know any rock 'n roll?
translation.zh: 好吗？拉斐 你会不会演奏摇滚乐？

translation.en: Is the Pope Catholic?
translation.zh: 教皇信不信天主教？

translation.en: -[piano playing cheerful music] -This.
translation.zh: 这就对了

translation.en: -Shall we dance, yeah? Let's. -Let's dance.
translation.zh: -我们来跳舞吧？ -我们跳舞吧 来吧

translation.zh: 起立迎接总理

translation.zh: 妈的 是本古里安 快起来

translation.en: [man] Sir.

translation.en: -Is this all of them? -Yes.
translation.zh: -所有人都在？ -是的

translation.en: [Ben-Gurion] Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: If you succeed...

translation.en: we deny the world the chance to let Eichmann's...
